channel.title: Hyperion[rs2remake]Hyperion
channel.description:
Hello there, Welcome to my new server project. No i won't have a o-so-exciting name like wafflescape. Ill just call the project Rs2Remake and our login will be just called Runescape. As hyperion already has.
I use hyperion just for stability.
How much will it cost to play Rs2Remake? Free of charge! totally free We want everyone to be able to enjoy those good old times! Either if you can't or didn't want to pay on Runescape. We just stay free anyway:D
What's the aim of this project? To bring old school runescape back like we all liked.
Isn't this going to be just another failure? I would say no. I will put all my effort in this to make it stay and not be another fail.
Who is in your development team?
The only programmer that's currently in the team is Me. Ill start a development team thread as soon as i finished this one[typing this now:d]
Okay so what we got yet:)
[img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-g129m.png[/img]
[img]http://www.imagenerd.com/uploads/1-3T69u.png[/img]
Thank you for reviewing my thread.

item.title: Hyperion[rs2remake]Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @iAquaS iAquaS
item.description:
@iAquaS wrote:

Personally, I preferred the old RuneScape a million times over what we have now. I like this idea, even though it would take quite a while to complete. But I’m sure if you really went on with it, and got the right team and advertisers, it would be quite popular.

Then again, here’s hoping training isn’t going to be the same. One of the things I didn’t like and still don’t like about RuneScape is the training times -_-

Good luck nonetheless.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion[rs2remake]Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

[quote=“runemaker, post:14, topic:343834”][quote author=`jeba link=topic=440224.msg3235615#msg3235615 date=1276455611]
Give up… Sorry but, really…

I understand some people like to do such things just to try and do what they can just for fun (which - I do support, don’t get me wrong). But unless you’re extremely knowledgeable about how EVERYTHING works, you’re not going to re-create anything.

Hehe. The first one is barbarian village:D Real 317 cache ftw.
Second one is at varrock at the spot where you start getrude’s cat and where you can cook./

That’s not the “real” 317 cache. As far as I know, the 317 cache is all but extinct. There was a 200(?) client + cache released on rune server - which people have been re-making into a make-shift 317 cache.
[/quote]

Jeba don’t forget that building and recreating a server is all a learning experience no one truly knows how EVERYTHING works. We learn by our mistakes, Goodluck to you Rene eats waffl3z :D[/quote]

That’s a fairly good point. I suppose it’s a goal.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion[rs2remake]Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:12, topic:343834"]Give up… Sorry but, really…

I understand some people like to do such things just to try and do what they can just for fun (which - I do support, don’t get me wrong). But unless you’re extremely knowledgeable about how EVERYTHING works, you’re not going to re-create anything.

Hehe. The first one is barbarian village:D Real 317 cache ftw.
Second one is at varrock at the spot where you start getrude’s cat and where you can cook./

That’s not the “real” 317 cache. As far as I know, the 317 cache is all but extinct. There was a 200(?) client + cache released on rune server - which people have been re-making into a make-shift 317 cache.[/quote]

i think yarnova released a 319 deob. Not quite sure if its the real 319 cache though, If so it would be about the closest thing to a 317 cache people would get without having the actual thing.

item.description:
@runemaker wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:12, topic:343834"]Give up… Sorry but, really…

I understand some people like to do such things just to try and do what they can just for fun (which - I do support, don’t get me wrong). But unless you’re extremely knowledgeable about how EVERYTHING works, you’re not going to re-create anything.

Hehe. The first one is barbarian village:D Real 317 cache ftw.
Second one is at varrock at the spot where you start getrude’s cat and where you can cook./

That’s not the “real” 317 cache. As far as I know, the 317 cache is all but extinct. There was a 200(?) client + cache released on rune server - which people have been re-making into a make-shift 317 cache.[/quote]

Jeba don’t forget that building and recreating a server is all a learning experience no one truly knows how EVERYTHING works. We learn by our mistakes, Goodluck to you Rene eats waffl3z

item.title: Hyperion[rs2remake]Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Give up… Sorry but, really…

I understand some people like to do such things just to try and do what they can just for fun (which - I do support, don’t get me wrong). But unless you’re extremely knowledgeable about how EVERYTHING works, you’re not going to re-create anything.

[quote=“Rene eats waffl3z, post:7, topic:343834”]Hehe. The first one is barbarian village:D Real 317 cache ftw.
Second one is at varrock at the spot where you start getrude’s cat and where you can cook./[/quote]

That’s not the “real” 317 cache. As far as I know, the 317 cache is all but extinct. There was a 200(?) client + cache released on rune server - which people have been re-making into a make-shift 317 cache.

Read full topic
